description:
Run with pride and plenty of color with these Run Zero Cushion Pride Rainbow Print Low Ankle Socks. With Smartwool’s lightest weight cushioning and a low ankle height to match your low-cut running shoes, these Merino wool socks are ready to show your love for running and love for love.

  • Indestructawool™ technology with extended durability zones
  • 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed-in, performance-oriented fit
  • Mesh zones for added breathability
  • Shred Shield™ technology reduces wear from toes
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe for enhanced comfort
  • Achilles tab prevents sock from slipping into footwear
name: Smartwool Run Zero Cushion Pride Rainbow Print Low Ankle Socks - Unisex
